body.name: VECELO Queen Size Bed Frame with Headboard, Heavy-Duty Platform with Steel Slats Support, No Box Spring Needed/Easy Assembly, Matte Black & Brown
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 22 hrs 35 mins
features: [Stylish Queen Bed Frame] - Blending a metal frame with brown wood, this queen bed frame incorporates both modern industrial and vintage elements. It would beautifully match either a master bedroom or guest room.

[Sturdy Structure] - This queen bed frame combines high-quality metal and wood, with a strong metal frame and warm, aesthetically-pleasing brown wooden headboard. The combination creates a sturdy, supportive structure.
[Easy Assembly] - The queen bed uses a modular, foldable design with stainless steel connectors, allowing for quick assembly without complex tools - just a few simple steps.
[Durable Queen Bed Frame] - The metal frame is made of rust-resistant stainless steel and powder-coated steel, while the headboard is quality MDF to ensure durability.
[Efficient Use of Space] - The 12.2 inch clearance underneath provides storage for large items or clutter, maximizing use of space. It also allows easy cleaning of dusty corners under the bed.
body.description: VECELO Metal Platform Bed Frame with Headboard and Footboard- Sturdy Support - Heavy duty steel frame and slats support up to 680 lbs. Powder-coated for durability.- Noise-Free - Come with padded strip to prevent metal squeaking. Non-slip. - Under Bed Storage - 12.2 inch clearance for storing items. No box spring needed.- Fast Assembly - Clear instructions for easy one-person assembly in 30 mins. Ships flat-packed in one box.Specifications:- Material: Wood, Metal- Product Dimension:75 x 39 x 40 in (Twin)74.8 x 54 x 40 in (Full) 80 x 60.20 x 40 in (Queen)- Package Size:42.1 x 16.9 x 5.9 Inch (Twin)57.1 x 16.9 x 5.9 Inch (Full)63.4 x 16.9 x 5.9 Inch (Queen)- Package Weight: 43.4 lbs (Twin), 55.6 lbs (Full), 58.4 lbs (Queen)- Package Includes:All accessories of bed frame4*4 mm L-shaped Allen KeyInstruction- Tips:Please read the instruction carefully before assemblyMattress is not includedEnsure all parts and screws are firmly attached before use

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Focus On Exquisite Sleep! If you want to sleep well, it's crucial to have a bed frame that is of high quality. The VECELO bed frame is crafted using high-quality materials and boasts exceptional load-bearing capacity while incorporating a unique technique that minimizes noise. With this bed frame, you can sleep soundly all night long without any disturbance.

Sparkle Point-1 Spacious Storage Space - The 12.2 inch clearance underneath provides storage for large items or clutter, maximizing use of space. It also allows easy cleaning of dusty corners under the bed. Embedded Design - Embedded bed corners easy to place mattresses and prevent mattresses from sliding, no box spring is needed.
Sparkle Point-2 Thoughtfully Design A richly finished headboard and footboard are not only beautiful, but made of high-quality metal and wood board that's sturdy & durable and easy to clean.

Easy Assembly - The bed rows are constructed with slots for easy installation and removal. Recommended: People who move frequently. Noise-free - The bed frame comes with a padded strip to reduce the friction between the bed slats and the frame. Thus achieving the effect of reducing noise generation. Sturdy Structure - This bed frame is strong and durable. The use of square steel tubes, which do not bend easily, enhances the load-bearing capacity of the bed. Maximum weight capacity: 600 lbs (Full), 650 lbs (Queen).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Bed Frame
reviews.reviewText: From its impressive under bed clearance to its robust stability, this bed frame has proven to be a remarkable addition to my bedroom. It provides ample space beneath the bed, allowing for convenient storage of various items, including luggage. This feature alone has significantly decluttered my living space, providing a neat and organized solution for storing items that are not in frequent use. The ability to effortlessly stow away baggage sizes is a game-changer, making this bed frame an ideal choice for those seeking to maximize their bedroom storage options.Moreover, the bed frame's sturdy construction instills a sense of confidence and reliability. I was particularly impressed by the exceptional stability it offers, which ensures a peaceful night's sleep, free from any squeaks or creaks. The frame's solid build quality guarantees longevity, assuring me that my investment will serve me well for years to come. Whether I'm sitting, lying down, or getting in and out of bed, the bed frame remains steadfast, providing a secure and comfortable sleeping experience.In terms of aesthetics, this bed frame seamlessly blends style with practicality. Its sleek design and clean lines effortlessly complement my bedroom decor.I wholeheartedly recommend the bed frame to anyone in need of a functional and stylish addition to their bedroom. Its remarkable under bed clearance, robust stability, effortless storage capability, and user-friendly installation make it a standout choice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You will not be disappointed.
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame is awesome. It was so easy to put together and it looks so nice. You will not be disappointed. All the screws/bolts are wrapped in clear plastic, labeled and match the instructions. I looked at a lot of bed frames and I picked this out because of the wood on the headboard match my night stands and the reviews are good. I had to get rid of my previous bed because it was too tall. This bed frame is the right height and easy to get in and out of bed. Plus you do not need a box spring.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice bed frame, not hard to assemble.
reviews.reviewText: Bed frame is nice, not hard to assemble, seems to be sturdy. Comes with spare hardware parts for each one.Only negative thing is it come packed with styrofoam makes a big mess.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the VECELO Twin Platform Bed Frame with Headboard, and it has been a solid addition to my bedroom. The assembly process was straightforward and hassle-free, living up to the claim of "easy assembly." The steel slats support the mattress well, and I appreciate not needing a box spring.The black finish gives it a sleek and modern look, blending nicely with my decor. The headboard is a convenient addition, providing some support and comfort when sitting up in bed.However, I would rate it four stars because I've noticed a slight creaking noise when I move around in bed. It's not a deal-breaker, but it's worth mentioning. Overall, this bed frame offers great value for its sturdiness, ease of assembly, and modern design. If you're looking for a reliable and stylish bed frame at an affordable price, the VECELO Twin Platform Bed Frame is a good choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was worried buying a bed frame I didn’t see in person but this has been a great experience. Well made, easy to put together and looks great!

reviews.reviewText: This frame looks amazing! It’s built very well and sturdy. My nephew loves it!! I am very pleased with the price, service and fast shipping!! Thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to install. Solid build with common tools.
reviews.reviewText: I got this frame to replace a bed that required a box spring. It was very simple to set up and came with everything necessary. It does not make noise and fits my mattress perfectly. I'm very happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewText: This foundation replaced aging bowstring and frame.The headboard was a nice touch top.
